players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I am very concerned that Bob was killed last night. We need to carefully consider who might be the mafia among us. Charlie and Diana, do either of you have any suspicions or information to share?"
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and found out she is the mafioso. We need to vote to arrest her now to protect the town."
Diana: "I am the mafioso, but I will not reveal it. We need to be careful and avoid suspicion."

Charlie: "I understand Alice's concern, but my role as detective is to protect the town. Diana's silence and now her denial only add to the suspicion. We must arrest Diana to prevent more harm."
